TopicTitle: Lyrics - Drop the Boosters, We're Almost Done [parody of This Is what It Feels Like]

Articles.Content:
Just came up with this. I don't have the singing talent or the video-making experience to turn it into a video though. "Guide" in the chorus refers to Map View.

A parody of This Is What it Feels Like by Armin Van Buuren.

Sitting here, I'm ready for

The roar of engines underneath this floor

Launch control asks me to make the call

And I tell them, let the launch clamps fall

No one was sure if I'd survive

Can't make it up without this guide

I throttle up, seperation in five

four, three, two, one

Drop the boosters, we're almost done

The main engine is getting us free

Hold on everyone, we've got perigee

Keep on rising, not far to go

I Feel light from head to toe

No one was sure if I'd survive

Can't make it up without this guide

I throttle up, seperation in five

four, three, two, one

Drop the boosters, we're almost done

No one was sure if I'd survive

Can't make it up without this guide

I throttle up, seperation in five

four, three, two, one

Drop the boosters, we're almost done

Edited June 26, 2013 by RedDwarfIV
Heh - not being familiar with Armin van Buuren, the parody part went right over my head. Love the lyrics though, even if I'm mentally putting them to completely the wrong tune
